page.title: 11My School Life in Ollerton
page.content: My name is Marie Jenkins and I live in New Ollerton.I attend{Forest {View Junior School.}It is Tuesday morning. I get up at 7.30 a.m., have a wash and clean my teeth and then have breakfast. I have toast and an orange drink. After breakfast I make my bed and get my things ready for school. I set off at 8.30 a.m. At 8.55 a.m. the bell goes and we all line up and go into school.We read until it is time for assembly. At assembly we sing songs and say prayers.After assembly we go back to class and work from the blackboard.When the bell goes for playtime I go out and play with my friends.After playtime I carry on working on my target until it is time for reading groups.These are little groups where we all work together. At 11.55 a.m. the bell goes for dinner.
